text: Kyrgyz language is the official language of Kyrgyzstan and a branch of Turkic languages that most Kyrgyz people speak with. Kyrgyz is written with the Cyrillic alphabet, but can be written in the Arabic alphabet in Xinjiang, Afghanistan, and Pakistan. ==References == == Related pages == * Kyrgyz people * Turkic languages == Other websites == * http://www.lmp.ucla.edu/Kyrgyz Category:Turkic languages Category:Languages of Kyrgyzstan Category:Languages of China Category:Languages of Russia Category:Languages of Tajikistan Category:Languages of Afghanistan
title: Kyrgyz language
